short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The perfect place to be if you're a Ski lover

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance any new tab with exciting images for Ski lovers.
When opening a new tab, the background of the tab will show a beautiful and exciting ski scene.

The new tab  embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing. No changes to your browser default search settings will be made.

By installing Ryorn Skipass extension, you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy elaborated on Ryorn Skipass website:

End User License Agreement: https://ryorn.com/eula
Privacy Policy: https://ryorn.com/privacy-policy

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
